info.description: A user-controlled input redirect users to an external website.
info.name: Open URL redirect detection
info.author: afaq,melbadry9,Elmahdi,pxmme1337,Regala_,andirrahmani1,geeknik

request:
GET ///example.com/%2F.. HTTP/1.1
Host: aides-territoires.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently
Connection: close
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
Date: Sun, 18 Jul 2021 01:03:53 GMT
Location: //example.com//../
Referrer-Policy: same-origin
Server: openresty
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Request-Id: 155b0acd-619b-419a-a81b-dd1bc17e0b45
Content-Length: 0
